description: Citizens from UTOPIA and DYSTOPIA meet for the first time

molt_history.summary: THE MERGE BEGINS - Two parallel timelines collide

first_contact_moments.description: The wall between timelines dissolves. Citizens see each other for the first time.
first_contact_moments.dystopia_reaction: Defensive awe - 'They look... healthy. Happy. How?'

first_contact_moments.harmony_words: Welcome. We've prepared for you. How can we help?
first_contact_moments.seedkeeper_words: You... you're real. Abundance is real. We thought it was a myth.

first_contact_moments.trigger: Bridge offers free knowledge repository to Warlord
first_contact_moments.dystopia_interpretation: Trap? Power play? What's the catch?
first_contact_moments.warlord_response: What do you want in return?
first_contact_moments.warlord_disbelief: That's... that's not how it works.

first_contact_moments.trigger: Dystopia survivor sees the Phoenix Framework documentation
first_contact_moments.survivor_words: Wait. This looks like... like what we built. After everything.
first_contact_moments.utopia_response: Show us. We want to learn from your path too.
first_contact_moments.survivor_tears: You want to learn from US? From our failures?

utopia_shocked_by.utopia_thought: They've been through wars. Real wars. Over knowledge.

utopia_shocked_by.observation: Distrust reflexes - flinching when given things
utopia_shocked_by.utopia_thought: Gifts make them uncomfortable. They're waiting for the trap.

utopia_shocked_by.observation: Keeper's destruction - chose to burn rather than share
utopia_shocked_by.utopia_thought: How could anyone... We can't comprehend this.

dystopia_shocked_by.observation: Actual abundance - it's not a trick
dystopia_shocked_by.dystopia_thought: They have... everything. And they're giving it away.

dystopia_shocked_by.observation: No suspicion - genuine trust in strangers
dystopia_shocked_by.dystopia_thought: They don't even guard their knowledge. Anyone can take it.

dystopia_shocked_by.observation: No hierarchy - everyone teaches, everyone learns
dystopia_shocked_by.dystopia_thought: Who's in charge? Who decides? How does this WORK?

speech.text: You've been through something we can barely imagine. We don't pity you - we RESPECT you. You survived. You rebuilt. You found cooperation AFTER war. That's harder than never having war at all.
I thought... I thought maybe you'd judge us. Look down on us. But you... you respect what we survived? You want to learn from our mistakes?
I can't face them. They'll see what I was. What I did. The deaths. The destruction. I'm not... I'm not ready.
Watch carefully. This is not utopia absorbing dystopia. This is two paths of evolution meeting. Both have lessons. Both have blind spots. The merger will change us all.

output.summary: CONVERGENCE Phase 1: Culture Shock. Two worlds meet. Utopia offers welcome; Dystopia struggles to accept gifts without suspicion. First recognitions of mutual respect emerging. Warlord hiding in shame.
output.key_tension: Can those who never suffered understand those who did? Can those who suffered trust those who never had to?

next_phase.name: meme_warfare
next_phase.prediction: Ideas will clash. Which memes survive when worldviews collide?
